Products > Soap

Black Raspberry Vanilla Artisan Bar

$7.00

(1 Customer Review)

Add To Cart
  • Description
  • Details

SoGa bars are handmade in small batches, with only vegan, sustainable oils used in their creation. Each handmade SoGa bar retains its own natural glycerin, keeping your skin smooth and soothed. Each bar is made with vegan ingredients, with custom blends of essential and fragrant oils to add the wonderful scent that you will not find anywhere else. Our bars will last many weeks when cared for properly, so keep out of the flow or pool of water to extend its life!

Weight: 130g

Dimensions: 9 x 6.5 x 2.5cm

Made With: Sodium Olivate, Sodium Cocoate, Sodium Ricate, Sodium Shea Butterate, Sodium Ricinoleate, glycerin, aqua, parfum, mica, titanium dioxide, tin oxide, iron oxides, parfum
